function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accumulation of indoor air fluid in buildings exacerbating sick building syndrome","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality affecting occupants' health","Mitigation":"Regular ventilation and air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, HVAC systems","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Unstable climates and climate change driving global emergence, resurgence, and redistributions of communicable infections","Impact":"Increased risk of the spread of communicable diseases","Mitigation":"Climate change mitigation strategies, infectious disease surveillance","Technologies":"Climate control technologies, disease surveillance systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"Climate policy makers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Air pollution raising human exposure to viral infections such as SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of viral infections","Mitigation":"Reducing air pollution, promoting air quality standards","Technologies":"Air pollution control technologies, air quality monitoring systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Environmental regulatory agencies"}]}
